uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.tool.bean

Class ViewBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.tool.bean.ViewBean
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthZGroupBean, AuthZGroupEditBean, HistoryBean

    public class ViewBean
extends Object
    This bean is a helper bean for the view view.
    Author:
    andrew

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewBean

        public ViewBean()
        Simple constructor that creates an empty view bean. You must set the pageName and the localSpace to make this useful

      • ViewBean

        public ViewBean(String name,
        String defaultSpace)
        Creates a ViewBean and set's the interested page name and local space
        Parameters:
        name - page name possibly non-globalised
        defaultSpace - default space to globalise against

        action - name of action to perform
        withBreadcrumbs - if false, breadcrumb disable is propagated
